citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm on
9/3/2024. The inspector made contact with the facility representative via phone and they stated that no one was available
to do the inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm on 
9/3/2024. The inspector made contact with the facility representative via phone and they stated that no one was available 
to do the inspection. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of 
the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
